text: geudaega geum-eulo jangsigdoen jib-eulgajgeona geudaega haneullo seungcheonhanda hayeodo ilg-eul gilog-eul gajyeooji a nihandamyeon ulineun geudaeui seungcheon-eul midji anh-eulila malhani illeogalodoenaui junimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo na neun ingan-eulosseo han seonjija-e bulgwa ham-ila
